name: Format Options
description: These options are used to modify returned data. Because these options are global, they appear OUTSIDE of any modules. See the example below

parameters.name: format.date.tz
parameters.description: Modifies most timestamps to convert from UTC into another timezone

parameters.name: format.date.format
parameters.description: Modifies how dates are turned. Uses [PHP's Date formatting](http://php.net/date)

parameters.name: format.colour.format
parameters.description: Changes how colours are returned. **Note the use of the British English spelling of colour (with a 'U')**

parameters.name: format.units
parameters.description: Changes how things such as speed, distance etc. are returned
